description: When attempting to convert a Bytearray to a string using the sys module, the program throws an error indicating that the Bytearray is not compatible with the sys module.
code:
import sys

# Program to take input from the user and print it

# importing the sys module 

# taking input from user 
name = input("Enter your name: ") 
  
# printing the input 
print("Hello", name)
